attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Emma has devoted her free time contributing to the comunity and discussing ideas for a better future amongst friends.
She has developed unparalleled ideals for a better tomorrow.
Lets make tomorrow, today.
Campaign Promises =
To solve obesity
To quash global warming
To defeat the recession

A vote for Emma is a vote for an interesting country









* we in the APESHIT party reserve the right to put fat people in warehouses and hook them up to machines to create electricity against their will.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
